00115                   {

00153             function                unsafe_select( $Condition )
00154             {
00155                   try
00156                   {
00157                         $this->Database->query_as( DB_OBJECT );
00158                         
00159                         return( 
00160                               $this->Database->select( 
00161                                     $this->UserAccess->NativeTable.'.* , '.$this->NativeTable.'.*' , 
00162                                     $this->NativeTable.' , '.$this->UserAccess->NativeTable , 
00163                                     $this->NativeTable.'.author = '.$this->UserAccess->NativeTable.".id 
00164                                           AND ( $this->AddLimitations ) AND $Condition"
00165                               )
00166                         );
00167                   }
00168                   catch( Exception $e )
00169                   {
00170                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00171                   }
00172             }

00250             function                delete( $id , $Options = ' 1 = 1' )
00251             {
00252                   try
00253                   {
00254                         $Link = get_package( 'link' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00255                         $Link->delete_link( false , $id , false , 'comment' );
00256 
00257                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00258                         $this->Database->delete( $this->NativeTable , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )" );
00259                         $this->Database->commit();
00260                   }
00261                   catch( Exception $e )
00262                   {

00289             function                create( $Record )
00290             {
00291                   try
00292                   {
00293                         $MasterLink = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'master_type:command;master_id:integer' );
00294 
00295                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'comment:string' );
00296                         set_field( $Record , 'author' , $this->UserAlgorithms->get_id() );
00297                         set_field( $Record , 'page' , $this->Security->get_srv( 'REQUEST_URI' , 'string' , './index.html' ) );
00298                         
00299                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record , CREATION_DATE );
00300                         
00301                         $id = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->create( $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values );
00302                         
00303                         $Link = get_package( 'link' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00304                         $Link->create_link( 
00305                               get_field( $MasterLink , 'master_id' ) , $id , 
00306                               get_field( $MasterLink , 'master_type' ) , 'comment'
00307                         );
00308                         
00309                         $EventManager = get_package( 'event_manager' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00310                         $EventManager->trigger_event( 'on_after_create_comment' , array( 'id' => $id ) );
00311                         
00312                         return( $id );
00313                   }
00314                   catch( Exception $e )
00315                   {
00316                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00317                   }
00318             }

00342             function                update( $id , $Record )
00343             {
00344                   try
00345                   {
00346                         $id = $this->Security->get( $id , 'integer_list' );
00347                         $Record = $this->Security->parse_parameters( $Record , 'comment:string' , 'allow_not_set' );
00348 
00349                         list( $Fields , $Values ) = $this->DatabaseAlgorithms->compile_fields_values( $Record );
00350                         
00351                         if( isset( $Fields[ 0 ] ) )
00352                         {
00353                               $this->Database->update( 
00354                                     $this->NativeTable , $Fields , $Values , "( $this->AddLimitations ) AND id IN ( $id )"
00355                               );
00356                               $this->Database->commit();
00357                         }
00358                   }
00359                   catch( Exception $e )
00360                   {
